p: After methylation of PD1-1, the methylated derivatives were analyzed using GC–MS. As shown in Table 1, the results showed that PD1-1 had two glycosidic linkages, namely 2,3,4,6-Me 4-Glc/Manp and 3,4,6-Me 3-Glc/Manf linkages, with contents of 2 and 14 mol%, respectively. These results show that PD1-1 mainly contains α- d-Glc/Manp-1- and -1-β- d-Glc/Manf-2- glycosidic bonds [ 20].
